openModalStep.loading:
**Functional Purpose**: Loading indicator text
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Left Hand Side → Open Modal Step
**When Users See This**: While the modal is loading and determining the track's learning mode status.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Loading.."
selectedLocalMachineStep.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the local machine setup instructions
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Left Hand Side → Selected Local Machine Step
**When Users See This**: After a user selects to work on their local machine
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Let's get coding!"
selectedLocalMachineStep.subtitle:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory text for the local machine setup steps
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Left Hand Side → Selected Local Machine Step
**When Users See This**: After a user selects to work on their local machine
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "There are three steps to get started:"
selectedLocalMachineStep.step3:
**Functional Purpose**: Instruction to download an exercise
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Left Hand Side → Selected Local Machine Step → Step 3
**When Users See This**: As part of the local machine setup instructions
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Download this exercise:"
selectedLocalMachineStep.continue:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to proceed to the next step
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Left Hand Side → Selected Local Machine Step
**When Users See This**: After completing the local machine setup steps
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Continue"
selectedLocalMachineStep.reset:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to reset choices in the modal
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Left Hand Side → Selected Local Machine Step
**When Users See This**: After making choices in the modal, allowing the user to restart the process
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Reset choices"
noLearningModeStep.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading informing the user they will be in Practice Mode
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Left Hand Side → Has No Learning Mode Step
**When Users See This**: If the selected track does not have a Learning Mode
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You'll be in Practice Mode"
noLearningModeStep.continue:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to proceed
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Left Hand Side → Has No Learning Mode Step
**When Users See This**: After reading the information about Practice Mode
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Continue"
